source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
    (COUNT(1)/ 50) + 1 AS recordcount
FROM 
    dbo.SCM_Order_Header
WHERE 
    order_request_no IN (
        SELECT 
            t1.order_request_no
        FROM 
            dbo.SCM_Order_Header t1
        JOIN 
            WMBORDERSHAPEbj1ugcj t2 ON t1.order_request_no = t2.order_request_no
    );

SELECT 
    t1.IDENTITY_NO,
    t1.ORD_REQ_NO,
    t1.SALES_ORDER,
    t1.ITEM_NO,
    t1.SHAPE_IND,
    t1.SHAPE_CD,
    t1.DIM_SEQ,
    t1.DIM_CHAR,
    t1.DIM_TYPE,
    t1.DIM_VALUE,
    t1.DIM_X,
    t1.DIM_Y,
    t1.DIM_Z,
    t1.CRITICAL_IND,
    t1.BEND_SEQ,
    t1.PRINT_TAG,
    t1.STATUS,
    t1.PROC_TIMESTAMP,
    t1.WBSElementId,
    t2.PROD_GRP
FROM 
    SAP_ORD_SHAPE_VARIANT_DSS t1
JOIN 
    SAP_ORDER_ITEM t2 ON t1.ORD_REQ_NO = t2.ORD_REQ_NO AND t1.ITEM_NO = t2.ITEM_NO
WHERE 
    t1.ORD_REQ_NO IN (
        SELECT sod.order_request_no
        FROM dbo.SCM_Order_Header sod
        JOIN WMBORDERSHAPEbj1ugcj wmb ON sod.order_request_no = wmb.order_request_no
    )
    AND t1.ITEM_NO IN (
        SELECT DISTINCT ITEM_NO 
        FROM SAP_ORD_SHAPE_VARIANT_DSS 
        WHERE ORD_REQ_NO IN (
            SELECT sod.order_request_no
            FROM dbo.SCM_Order_Header sod
            JOIN WMBORDERSHAPEbj1ugcj wmb ON sod.order_request_no = wmb.order_request_no
        )
    );

DECLARE @cols AS NVARCHAR(MAX),
 
        @query AS NVARCHAR(MAX),
 
        @topN INT = 20, -- Number of dimension sets to pivot
 
        @counter INT = 1, -- Counter for the loop
 
        @maxCounter INT = 20; -- Maximum counter value for the loop
-- Initialize the column strings
 
SET @cols = '';
-- Loop to generate column aliases
 
WHILE @counter <= @maxCounter
 
BEGIN
 
    SET @cols = @cols +
 
        'MAX(CASE WHEN GroupedRowNum = ' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ' THEN DIM_X END) AS DIM_X' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ', ' +
 
        'MAX(CASE WHEN GroupedRowNum = ' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ' THEN DIM_Y END) AS DIM_Y' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ', ' +
 
        'MAX(CASE WHEN GroupedRowNum = ' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ' THEN DIM_CHAR END) AS DIM_CHAR' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ', ' +
 
        'MAX(CASE WHEN GroupedRowNum = ' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ' THEN DIM_TYPE END) AS DIM_TYPE' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ', ' +
 
        'MAX(CASE WHEN GroupedRowNum = ' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ' THEN DIM_VALUE END) AS DIM_VALUE' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ', ' +
 
        'MAX(CASE WHEN GroupedRowNum = ' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ' THEN CRITICAL_IND END) AS CRITICAL_IND' + CAST(@counter AS VARCHAR(10)) + ', ';
 
    SET @counter = @counter + 1;
 
END;
-- Remove trailing comma and space
 
SET @cols = LEFT(@cols, LEN(@cols) - 2);
-- Generate the full dynamic SQL query
 
SET @query = '
 
WITH RankedData AS (
 
    SELECT top 100
 
        ORD_REQ_NO,
 
        ITEM_NO,
 
        DIM_X,
 
        DIM_Y,
 
        DIM_CHAR,
 
        DIM_TYPE,
 
        DIM_VALUE,
 
        CRITICAL_IND,
 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ORD_REQ_NO ORDER BY ITEM_NO) AS RowNum,
 
        CEILING(CAST(ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ORD_REQ_NO ORDER BY ITEM_NO) AS FLOAT) / ' + CAST(@topN AS NVARCHAR) + ') AS GroupNum,
 
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY ORD_REQ_NO ORDER BY ITEM_NO) AS GroupedRowNum
 
    FROM
 
        SAP_ORD_SHAPE_VARIANT_DSS
 
)
 
SELECT
 
    ORD_REQ_NO,
 
    ITEM_NO,
 
    ' + @cols + '
 
FROM RankedData
 
GROUP BY ORD_REQ_NO, ITEM_NO, GroupNum, GroupedRowNum
 
ORDER BY ORD_REQ_NO, GroupNum, GroupedRowNum;';
-- Execute the dynamic SQL
 
EXEC sp_executesql @query;

scripts.text:
UPDATE dbo.SCM_Order_Header
SET transfer_status = 'F'
WHERE order_request_no IN (
    SELECT sod.order_request_no
    FROM dbo.SCM_Order_Header sod
    JOIN WMBORDERSHAPEbj1ugcj wmb ON sod.order_request_no = wmb.order_request_no
);

UPDATE dbo.SCM_Order_Header
SET transfer_status = 'S'
WHERE order_request_no IN (
    SELECT sod.order_request_no
    FROM dbo.SCM_Order_Header sod
    JOIN WMBORDERSHAPEbj1ugcj wmb ON sod.order_request_no = wmb.order_request_no
);
